Published January 28 2015

Parsing the Language

Parsing the Language — For the past 10 minutes, I’ve been playing with this sentence structure tree generator from Carnegie Mellon. As natural language processing becomes more prominent in technology (Siri, Google Now), I’m becoming increasingly curious about the techniques computers use to dissect our grammar.

Enjoy your day.
